channel.title: Design on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Design on PR

item.title: Flickr - How not to design backup userdata when shutting down your service
item.description: Happy New Year - 2019 It is always easy to find fault in a service. So this isn’t very hard for me.

item.title: iPad Pro and Apple
item.description: Last Sunday, I got to try iPad pro with all its accessories (most of the outlet here has only iPad pro without keyboard & pencil).

item.title: Image Slicing (Repeatable image) with Xcode Asset Catalog
item.description: Image slicing option in xcode asset catalog allows you to define resiziable area an image so it can be repeated to fit the object’s height & width.

item.title: Bitsplitting - Logo
item.description: Bitsplitting - Beautiful logo I have seen in a long time. I don’t know how @danielpunkass decided to use one version of the two.

item.title: iTunes 10 Logo
item.description: End credits from the movie Up iTunes logo updated with version 10 in Sep ‘10

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: Wallpaper - Testflight app
item.description: I really liked the background image pattern used in testflightapp.com. It is so cool that I have replaced my all time favorite iPad-Safari-fabric texture to gray varient given below.
